full_summary:
### Title
* Request for Supply Arrangement for Agricultural Tractors (E60HS 18AGTR)
* Demande d'arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement pour tracteurs agricoles E60HS 18AGTR

### RFP Details
* **Reference Number:** WS4153305060 - Doc4153316176
* **Amendment:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4153305060
* **Publication Date:** August 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:**  May 7, 2027, at 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Date:** January 22, 2024

### Procurement Information
* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Supply Arrangement
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, WTO GPA, CPTPP, NAFTA, CCFTA
* **Regions of Opportunity:** No restrictions
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

### Contact Information
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** Raphael Lafontaine, rsa-spac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Requirements
The Government of Canada is seeking to establish Supply Arrangements (SAs) for the procurement of agricultural tractors and ancillary items. Suppliers may submit arrangements for specific configurations, but must also submit arrangements for all items within the configuration. The terms and conditions of this tender can be found in Annex A - Purchase Description. Suppliers must submit all required documentation and bids to the specified contact information by the tender closing date.

**Important Note:** The original posting closing time has been invalidated. All submissions must be made by May 7, 2027, at 14:00 EST to be considered valid.

### RFP Documents
Refer to the [north American RFP website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17234464?extsite=MTcyMzQ0NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for more information or to
